interests.name: Pompeii
interests.description: Ancient Ruins of the city of Pompeii

interests.name: Museum of Music Boxes and Automatons
interests.description: The clockmaker Antoine Favre-Salomon, a native of Geneva, invented a musical pocket watch in 1796. Since then he is considered to be the inventor of the music box, and Sainte-Croix became the world capital of mechanical music. Music automatons are still produced here.
